description: Stretchy bamboo and lycra makes the Vasquez ridiculously soft and comfortable. Wear it to the gym, under a sport coat or on its own. Antimicrobial fabric cuts stink from the equation, making it the essential travel companion when you can’t do laundry every day. It also means you can sweat, a lot. Your new favourite, Canadian-made & perfectly fitting long-sleeve is here.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Vasquez - Hooded LS Shirt - Mens
